Package simple.io

Class Summary
ByteBuffer Byte buffer utilizing a circular array that can auto-grow.
DoubleParsePosition Object to hold start and end positions.
Start and end positions can be marked and restored.
Has several convenience methods.
IOLink Links an OutputStream with an InputStream or a Writer with a Reader.
ParsePosition Holder for the current position while parsing.
RenameFormat Depends on simple.io.ParseException, simple.util.do_str Rename Tokens: $N File name without extension $N(n) Characters starting from n of the file name without extension.
SFileFilter Simple version of a mask to filter files.
StaticPrinter Prints various iterable and non-iterable things to a stream.
StringWriterExt Extends upon StringWriter to add writeln().
TextAreaOutputStream An output stream that prints to a JTextArea.
TextAreaWriter A Writer that prints to a JTextArea.
WriterOutputStream An OutputStream that prints to a Writer.
 

Exception Summary
ParseException For use with ParsePosition
Created: 2008
